class_notes:
(Same as SPAN 408 900)
Topic:  Dueling Tongues: Language & Identity in Spain. 
Study Abroad. Course meets abroad from May 12 - June 25, 2023. Apply online at www.studyabroad.emory.edu
course_description: Part of the Iberian Studies Summer Program, this course explores how and why language varies in Spain and how variation and multilingualism relate to competing identities and ideologies. Students conduct surveys, interviews, conversation analyses, and work collaboratively on research projects.
sections: Class Nbr: 2345, Section #: 900, Type: ABR, Campus: ATL, Meets: Does Not Meet, Instructor: D. Tuten, Status: Open
